title: Paste Services
description:
If your message is less than 2000 characters, but still relatively long, please use `sudo pastebin <message text without <> here>` to upload it.
If your message is longer than 2000 characters, please use one of the services below:

**[termbin](http://termbin.com)**
Can only be used from the command line by piping other commands into `nc termbin.com 9999` as shown below:
```bash
cat /var/log/Xorg.0.log | nc termbin.com 9999
```
**[paste.ubuntu.ir](https://paste.ubuntu.ir)**
Can be used online or from the command line (no file size limit):
```bash
cat /var/log/Xorg.0.log | nc -N paste.ubuntu.ir 1337
```
**[paste.rs](https://paste.rs/web)**
Can be used online or from the command line:
```bash
cat /var/log/Xorg.0.log | curl --data-binary @- https://paste.rs/
```
